term.title: photoinduced polymerization

item.text: The polymerization of a monomer by a free radical or ionic chain reaction initiated by photoexcitation.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2223. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2261 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122223)
